001package edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.controller;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import android.os.Bundle;
005import android.view.Menu;
006import android.view.MenuItem;
007import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
008import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
009import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
010import androidx.navigation.NavController;
011import androidx.navigation.fragment.NavHostFragment;
012import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
013import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.R;
014import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.databinding.ActivityMainBinding;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.viewmodel.GameViewModel;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.uno.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
017
018/**
019 * Main activity of the application.
020 *
021 * <p>Handles creating the MainActivity menu options for the settings and sign-out menu. It also
022 * handles/sets up navigation for this activity.</p>
023 */
024@AndroidEntryPoint
025public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
026
027  private ActivityMainBinding binding;
028  private LoginViewModel loginViewModel;
029  private GameViewModel gameViewModel;
030  private NavController navController;
031
032  @Override
033  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
034    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
035    binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
036    setContentView(binding.getRoot());
037    setupNavigation();
038    setupViewModel();
039  }
040
041  @Override
042  public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) {
043    super.onCreateOptionsMenu(menu);
044    getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.main_options, menu);
045    return true;
046  }
047
048  @Override
049  public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem item) {
050    boolean handled = true;
051    if (item.getItemId() == R.id.settings) {
052      Intent intent = new Intent(this, SettingsActivity.class);
053      startActivity(intent);
054    } else if (item.getItemId() == R.id.sign_out) {
055      loginViewModel.signOut();
056    } else {
057      handled = super.onOptionsItemSelected(item);
058    }
059    return handled;
060  }
061
062  @Override
063  public boolean onSupportNavigateUp() {
064    return navController.navigateUp() || super.onSupportNavigateUp();
065  }
066
067  private void setupNavigation() {
068    //noinspection DataFlowIssue
069    navController = ((NavHostFragment) getSupportFragmentManager()
070        .findFragmentById(R.id.nav_host_fragment))
071        .getNavController();
072  }
073
074  private void setupViewModel () {
075    ViewModelProvider provider = new ViewModelProvider(this);
076    loginViewModel = provider.get(LoginViewModel.class);
077    loginViewModel.getAccount()
078        .observe(this, (account) -> {
079          if (account == null) {
080            Intent intent = new Intent(this, LoginActivity.class)
081                .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK);
082            startActivity(intent);
083          }
084        });
085  }
086}
